channel.title: Why cache be so lame?
channel.description:
No matter how I upload or zip my cache, it always comes out something like this: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/1.png[/img] I've tried highlighting all files in the folder then clicking send to zip. I've tried just zipping the whole file. And it all does the same.
Someone help please.. I need this for my server.

item.title: Why cache be so lame?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:2, topic:428408”]The zip looks like it very well has the data inside of it; seems to be a problem with unzipping maybe? Try using a different application to unzip the archive like 7zip. If your client is automatically unzipping it, then it is probably an issue with your code.
I didn’t entirely understand your post due to myself being extremely tired, but hope I helped.[/quote]
It worked fine before I modified the cache and re-uploaded and changed the settings etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Why cache be so lame?
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

The zip looks like it very well has the data inside of it; seems to be a problem with unzipping maybe? Try using a different application to unzip the archive like 7zip. If your client is automatically unzipping it, then it is probably an issue with your code.
I didn’t entirely understand your post due to myself being extremely tired, but hope I helped.

Read full topic
